name: Michael Viveros
body:
```scheme
(while (< i num-rows)
  (set! y (* i pic-height))
  (set! j 0)
  (while (< j num-cols)
    ; get random pic and update filelist
    (set! x (* j pic-width))
    (set! retvals (get-random-pic filelist num-pics-available 0 #f image))
    (set! num-pics-available (- num-pics-available 1))
    (set! pic (car retvals))
    (set! filelist (cadr retvals))
```

### Blog
[Blog 1 - April 2016](http://michaelviveros.com/blog1/)

### BirdieStats
Input Scores | View Stats
------------ | -------------
![Screenshot](http://michaelviveros.com/images/Screenshot1.JPG) | ![Screenshot](http://michaelviveros.com/images/Screenshot2.JPG)

BirdieStats is an application used by golfers to track their stats. It consists of a website, server, database and mobile app using VueJS, NodeJS, PostgreSQL and Cordova, respectively.

[Website](http://www.birdiestats.com), [App](https://play.google.com/store?hl=en), [Code](https://github.com/MichaelViveros)

![Architecture](http://michaelviveros.com/images/Architecture.jpg)
